text: @NYGovCuomo Kawasaki disease is not something new but hard to diagnose at the beginning. How can you tell the difference between died from Kawasaki Vs died from covid-19? If I die in car accident but I am covid19 positive in my autopsy, then you will conclude I die from covid 19?
